channel.title: Airbnb on Boaz Sobrado's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Airbnb on Boaz Sobrado's Website

item.title: Trumped: Cubaâ€™s short term property rental market 2017-2018
item.description: In July of 2017 President Trump announced with much fanfare a new policy towards Cuba. This was following the Obama administrations “thaw” in Cuban-American bilateral relations, which had lead to a noticable rise in Americas visiting the island. Then more bad news for the Cuban tourism industry: sonic warfare in the news hurricanes All of this together had a noticable impact on the Cuban tourism sector. Official Cuban statistics show that tourism numbers are going up.

item.title: Raising money for friends hurt by Hurricane Irma
item.description: For the last year I have been helping people in Cuba sell tourism services online. In practice, this usually means creating accomodation listings on sites like Airbnb, messaging the guests and making sure the money gets to the hosts. About six months into doing this, I discovered a tool called Guesty which made things considerably easier (more on this in a bit). In September due to Hurricane Irma came. Most guests cancelled their reservations.
